indicator.title: Output Indicator

baseline.comment:
1. Cumulative CO2 emission reduction from the buildings sector by end-of-project (EOP, Year 2014), kton CO2eq: 0
2. % reduction in GHG emissions from the buildings sector by EOP: 0
3. Average emission reduction in the buildings sector by EOP, kg/m2: 0
4. Cumulative energy savings from the buildings sector by EOP, GWh: 0
5. Average BEI in the Malaysian buildings sector by EOP, kWh/m2-yr: 205
6. % Energy savings reduction by EOP: 0
7. No. buildings with EMS and/or EMP in place by EOP: 160
8. % improvement of BEI in the buildings sector by EOP: 0
9. No. of new EE buildings by EOP (Basis: End 2009): 0
10. % of new buildings that are considered EE buildings at EOP (Basis: End 2009): 0

target.comment:
Cumulative CO2 emission reduction from the buildings sector by end-of-project (EOP, Year 2014), kton CO2eq: 413 % reduction in GHG emissions from the buildings sector by EOP: 3.8 Average emission reduction in the buildings sector by EOP, kg/m2: 5.3 Cumulative energy savings from the buildings sector by EOP, GWh: 603 Average BEI in the Malaysian buildings sector by EOP, kWh/m2-yr: 194.9 % Energy savings reduction by EOP: 3.8 No. buildings with EMS and/or EMP in place by EOP: 350 % improvement of BEI in the buildings sector by EOP: 5.2 No. of new EE buildings by EOP (Basis: End 2009): 24 % of new buildings that are considered EE buildings at EOP (Basis: End 2009): 21
The project is to complete the mid-term evaluation by year-end

actual.comment:
Cumulative CO2 emission reduction from the buildings sector by end-of-project (EOP, Year 2014), kton CO2eq: 0 % reduction in GHG emissions from the buildings sector by EOP: 0 Average emission reduction in the buildings sector by EOP, kg/m2: 0 Cumulative energy savings from the buildings sector by EOP, GWh: 0 Average BEI in the Malaysian buildings sector by EOP, kWh/m2-yr: 205 % Energy savings reduction by EOP: 0 No. buildings with EMS and/or EMP in place by EOP: 195 % improvement of BEI in the buildings sector by EOP: 0 No. of new EE buildings by EOP (Basis: End 2009): 35 % of new buildings that are considered EE buildings at EOP (Basis: End 2009): 1
from PIR 2014 (up to June)

target.comment:
Cumulative CO2 emission reduction from the buildings sector by end-of-project (EOP, Year 2014), kton CO2eq: 147 % reduction in GHG emissions from the buildings sector by EOP: 1.9 Average emission reduction in the buildings sector by EOP, kg/m2: 2.65 Cumulative energy savings from the buildings sector by EOP, GWh: 215 Average BEI in the Malaysian buildings sector by EOP, kWh/m2-yr: 199.2 % Energy savings reduction by EOP: 1.9 No. buildings with EMS and/or EMP in place by EOP: 275 % improvement of BEI in the buildings sector by EOP: 2.9 No. of new EE buildings by EOP (Basis: End 2009): 17 % of new buildings that are considered EE buildings at EOP (Basis: End 2009): 16
note: this consists of new set of target after mid-term review

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description:
1. Main Report on Housing for the Bottom 50% including the following elements, and to be submitted to the 11th Malaysia Plan consultative process: 1a. Establishment of Multidimensional framework; 1b. Review of B50 housing system and institutions, and recommendations provided; 1c. Establishment of linkages to other urban sectors, and recommendations provided.
2. Socio-spatial Mapping Exercise conducted: 2a. Relevant socio-spatial data obtained, 2b.Database(s) established in EPU, 2c. Database integration completed, 2d. Mapping and Analysis delivered
3. Primary Research conducted: 3a. Primary survey report completed, 3b. Focus group discussions held and results reported
4. Report on International Best Practices: 4a. Best practices and relevant public housing models from benchmark countries reported and contextualized for Malaysia, 4b. Other relevant areas identified by the lead researcher in Output 1

baseline.comment:
1. Previous relevant reports and policies on housing and the bottom 50%: EPU’s report on the UVG; National Housing Policy; Housing programmes under 10MP; PR1MA Study; Action Plan Report by Jabatan Perumahan Negara
2: Previously established studies as reference and input: Multidimensional Framework established in Output 1; Urban Poverty Mapping Report in KL and PJ in 2006
3: Previously established research as guidance: Multidimensional Framework established in Output 1
4: Contextual guide: Multidimensional Framework established in Output 1

target.comment:
Output 1: Inception Report, Interim Report
Output 2: Preliminary (Interim) Report
Output 3: Inception Report, Interim Report
Output 4: Preliminary (Interim) Report

actual.comment:
Output 1: Interim Report Completed
Output 2: Interim Report Completed
Output 3: Interim Report Completed
Output 4: Interim Report Completed

target.comment:
Output 1: Final Report & Survey Report
Output 2: Final Report
Output 3: Output dropped after interim stage
Output 4: Final Report

actual.comment:
Output 1: Survey Report finalized, Main Report revision in progress
Output 2: Final Report revision in progress
Output 3: Output dropped after interim stage
Output 4: Final Report revision in progress
